title: Pumpkin and chocolate chip loaf cake
ingredients: ['225g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '110g margarine', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '185g pumpkin puree', '130g dark chocolate chips', '90g chopped walnuts', 'Glaze', '120g icing sugar', '1 tablespoon milk', '1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
